>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.On2ZrPJTe8FURsXY]{Operative Exploit}

By keeping an eye on the flow of magic, you can dodge harmful effects before they reach you. You can maintain concentration on @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.kxx5x0JAgFuEQJAm]{Detect Magic} as a swift action. As long as you are detecting magic, when you become the target of a spell that allows a Fortitude or Will saving throw, you can roll a Reflex save instead. You can use this ability even if you are not detecting magic by spending 1 Resolve Point. You must have the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.zuTU6TUbZNEZj0zD]{Sense Magic (Su)} (Starfinder Galactic Magic 29) exploit to learn this exploit.

duration.value: Maintained by spending a Swift Action each round
